articles.title: Saints' Alvin Kamara (rib) expects to play against Seahawks - ESPN
articles.description: Saints running back Alvin Kamara, who sat out in Weeks 2 and 4 because of a rib injury, said he's "feeling great" and plans to play Sunday against the Seahawks.
articles.content: METAIRIE, La. -- New Orleans Saints running back Alvin Kamara said he's feeling good and plans to play against the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday after missing last week's game against the Minnesota Viki… [+2297 chars]
